name: Wall Dodger Classic
description:
Welcome to Wall Dodger! The first game I ever created....remade. A simple 2D maze game. Make it to the end of each level without touching the walls.  I wanted to make a 3D version of this game to test how far my skills have come, but I no longer had the original source files for the game so I remade it!

Play the 3D Version: https://ally-maraza.itch.io/wall-dodger-3d
